definition: to combine a powdery substance (flour, plaster etc) with water/Taiwan pr. [huo4]
to compose a poem in reply (to sb's poem) using the same rhyme sequence/to join in the singing/to chime in with others
to mix (ingredients) together/to blend/classifier for rinses of clothes/classifier for boilings of medicinal herbs
to complete a set in mahjong or playing cards
and/together with/with/sum/union/peace/harmony/Taiwan pr. [han4] when it means "and" or "with"
good (virtuous)/benevolent/well-disposed/good at sth/to improve or perfect

sentences.english: He always optimistic and genially treats the others.
sentences.chinese: 他总是乐观的，并且和善地对待别人。

sentences.english: He's the mildest man you could wish to meet.
sentences.chinese: 他是你能见到的最和善的人。

sentences.english: they are (the kindest) parents I know.
sentences.chinese: 他们是我所知道的最和善的父母。

sentences.english: A man who is gentle and kind, sometimes with nonsense.
sentences.chinese: 一个温雅和善的人，有时候比较无厘头。

sentences.english: The place was in charge of a Major Donald, a good-nature fellow.
sentences.chinese: 这地方由性情和善的唐纳德市长负责。

sentences.english: He was a kingly and kindly figure, benevolent but not uninvolved.
sentences.chinese: 他有一副君主的与和善的面貌，慈悲，但陷入里面去。

sentences.english: She lays a kindly hand like a tiny starfish on my knee.
sentences.chinese: 她和善地伸出手，像小海星一样放在我的膝盖上。

sentences.english: Tahitians are very respectful and generous and kind.
sentences.chinese: 塔希提人是非常讲礼貌，慷慨而和善的。

sentences.english: Hansel and Gretel feel better. The old woman seems nice.
sentences.chinese: 汉瑟和葛丽特心情好多了，因为老婆婆似乎很和善。

sentences.english: In the eyes of the servants, Councillor Zhang is an amiable person.
sentences.chinese: 在下人们的眼中，张员外是个和善的人。

sentences.english: He had a sympathetic look, he was warm-hearted.
sentences.chinese: 他看起来很和善，是个热心人。

sentences.english: But Mas Lynde said kindly, 'Of course I forgive you.
sentences.chinese: 林德太太和善地说，“我当然会原谅你的。”

sentences.english: He was a heavy man, paunchy, with a lined, kind face.
sentences.chinese: 他是个大腹便便的胖子，长着皱纹的脸很和善。

sentences.english: On my asking for information, the policeman kindly led me to the inquiry office .
sentences.chinese: 在我询问消息时，警察和善地把我领到问讯处。

sentences.english: It denigrates and belittles the qualities needed to care, such as patience and gentleness.
sentences.chinese: 它贬低和轻视了照顾质量，例如耐心和善。

definition: amiable and approachable (idiom); easy-going/modest and unassuming/(of writing) plain and simple/easy to understand
cultured and refined (idiom); gentle and cultivated
